name: What It Takes... To Earn $1,000,000 in Direct Sales (Vol. 4)
description:
In volume 4 of What it Takes… To Earn $1,000,000 in Direct Sales, Kirsten continues her quest to reveal the untold truths of network marketing. What new perspectives and insights make the difference? If you want to know what it really takes to earn a million in the red hot direct sales field, consider this your book of secrets. Volume 3 features ten exclusive interviews with these million+ producers:

-Michelle Barnes, Vemma
-Lise Clark, Mary Kay
-Kami Dempsey, It Works
-Joannie Flynn, Tupperware
-CJ Haynes, Passion Parties
-Darlene Horwath, Passion Parties
-Nicole Rose, Isagenix
-Ann Taylor, Passion Parties
-Jackie Ulmer, Scent-Sations
-Candi Wingate, Nannies4hire.com

And a bonus chapter by Dana Wilde: Five Steps to Help You Pick Up the Phone in Your Direct Sales or Home Party Plan Business

name: What It Takes... To Earn $1,000,000 in Direct Sales (Vol. 1)
description: The paperback edition of Kirsten McCay-Smith's first volume from our 'What it Takes' series. Volume 1 features ten exclusive interviews with millioniare women from Avon, Isagenix, Mary Kay, Passion Parties, Pre Paid Legal, Tastefully Simple, Tupperware, and more! Featuring: Ellen Annis, Tupperware Christa Aufdemberg, Pre-Paid Legal Risa Barash, Fairy Tales Hair Care Cindy Heugly, Isagenix Jan Moestue, Passion Parties Bonnie Perkins, Isagenix Jennifer Raybaud, Tastefully Simple Susan Sly, Isagenix Sherry Weaver, Passion Parties Lisa Wilber, Avon Bonus Chapter: Build Up Your Ability to Bounce Back From Setback by Caterina Rando If you prefer the ebook version instead, please select below:

name: What It Takes... To Earn $1,000,000 in Direct Sales (Vol. 5)
description:
Take your assumptions, turn them into questions, and you will find the truth.

Within this book are exclusive interviews straight from multi-million dollar producers that speak for themselves. They show what it really takes to succeed, the only way it truthfully can be told; from those who have already achieved that level of success. The interviews convey the unwritten rules, expose myths, and reveal new truths about what it takes to succeed in direct sales and network marketing. When you surround yourself with those you admire, you can’t help but be inspired to take action. Our potential can only be fully realized when we discover our true passion, and these women have found a channel to express their passion in their own unique way.

Features interviews with:
-Meda Branwell, Creative Memories
-Ahna Cleveland, Ahna Cleveland Accessories
-Miki Crowl, Avon
-Cindy Keske, Mary Kay
-Kathy Marrs, Avon
-Lorie Mulhern, USANA
-Myndie Neece, Keller Williams
-Rosemarie Osolinsky, Avon
-Tami Quilici, Passion Parties
-Lorna Rasmussen, Pre-Paid Legal

Plus a bonus chapter by Brian Tracy, Motivational Business Speaker
